1242.content:
"I'm going to pass, Bob. Truthfully, I wasn't that wild about being the test subject in the first place."
Before Bob can say anything in reply, their division chief walked into the room.
"Everything OK in here?"
Bob nodded. "One of the power channelers took a hit, but everything's up and running. We were just talking about another test."
Before Hailey could say anything, their division chief cut in.
"Well, I'm afraid that's now impossible. Here are copies of the orders we just got from our congressional oversight committee."
Bob read through the first couple of sentences and then grumbled, "Lansing."
Hailey read through it and understood why Bob was blaming Lansing. Dr. Victoria Lansing was the project's veterinarian, and had never been happy with the shape some of her charges had been returned to her after testing the machines. And it seemed that Dr. Lansing had been talking to more than one congressional staffer about the waste of money she perceived the project to be. The last sentence in the letters said that the project was suspended pending review, but everyone in that room knew what it really meant: the project had been canceled.
Their division director looked at his two people, disappointment clearly etched on their faces. "C'mon, the rest of the division is heading to Rowdy's Pub. First rounds on me." Silently, Hailey and Bob followed their supervisor.

1321.content:
"Bon Voyage, bitch!" exclaimed Bob as he pushed the 6 inch redhead into the shoebox and quickly sealed the lid, muffling her screams. "Well, Hailey, would you like to give our dear friend James in the mailroom his present?"

"Yes, I think James would be delighted to receive THIS present." Hailey giggles. A mischievous smile crept across her lips as she grabbed the box and proceeded down the hall towards the mail room.

James stood 5'6 which was relatively short for a guy. He still remembers the day when that towering 6ft tall bitch named Sharon cost him his job in the office. He was now demoted to sorting mail in the mail room, which pissed him off to no end. He had such a bright future ahead of him and it was all trampled underfoot by that towering redhead.

"James!" Hailey blurted out upon entering the mailroom. "Me and Bob always felt terrible that you had fallen so low... we thought it would cheer you up a little if we got you a present. Here, take this." She said, handing the shoebox over to James.

"Thank you. It isn't gift-wrapped or nothing, but I'm sure it is something good..." He lifted the lid and looked down in amazement at what appeared to be a doll huddled in the corner of the box. "Umm, I appreciate the gift but I'm really not into dolls, though I must admit this one is rather lifelike..."

Before anyone either of them could say another word, Sharon looked up with tears in her eyes at the billboard sized face of a man she had destroyed a few years before in her climb up the ladder. She emitted a high-pitched scream.

James emotions drifted from amazement to realization to anger and then to hate. He shook the box and yelled down at her: "you ruined my life and humiliated me, you tall bitch! But now I am the tall one and it is payback time."

Hailey grinned to herself. This was working out better than she expected. "Well, have fun. I've got to get back to the lab for more research." And with that she turned and left Sharon and James alone.

When Bob thought he could shrink Sharron down to six inches, he was all in favor of handing her over to James. One, Sharron was a little scheming bitch (now literally a little scheming bitch) who unfortunately, because of her familial connections, might actually ge put in charge of everything one day. And nobody wanted that.

And second, although Bob wanted Shannon out of the way, he wasn't completely ruthless. Even as much as he despised Sharron, he wouldn't have handed her over to anybody. Not when she was only six inches tall and defenseless. But James was a saint. Sharron's life wouldn't be peaches and cream, but James wouldn't hurt her. Who knows, Sharron might even enjoy being a tiny princess, pampered, petted and taken care of.

Hailey then escorted her over to the grid in front of the machine. "Alright, countdown 3...2...1..." Hailey then pushed a button on the machine which zapped Sharon.

The 6ft redhead quickly dwindled along with her clothing. When the machine finally finished, Sharon could no longer be seen from the distance Bob and Hailey were standing. They moved closer and bent down for a closer look.

Sharon didn't know what the machine was going to do to her as she stepped onto the grid. She thought it might be some miracle treatment for cancer or something, not that she had cancer. She thought this would put her in better terms with her boss, Mr. Dixon. If she had known that this device was going to shrink her down, though, she NEVER would have agreed to participate. She loved her height, and seen it as an asset with which to dominate her coworkers.

Now though, the room had grown far larger and Bob and Hailey must have been thousands of feet tall! They both bent down to look at her and she felt totally naked and exposed, even though her business uniform has shrank down with her.

The two giants were talking amongst themselves."I estimate she is about 1 centimeter tall." said the female giant. The voice was loud and deep yet somehow still feminine. The vibrations of the voice reverberated through her body and made her fall to her knees and began crying.

"V-Victoria?" She whispered in awe. but before she could inform Bob, The emergency lights flickered and suddenly filled the room with a familiar cacophonous whirring of machinery and a high pitched whine that made Hailey's stomach flip. Wheeling around towards the operating station, she could not make out Bob's expression through the blinding light that had suddenly filled the room but could see him moving around frantically. As the world around Hailey began to quickly expand, the pitch of her scream shifted into a squeak.

info.brief_description: Scientists develop a shrinking device; what awaits the person who goes under the beam?
info.description:
A team of scientists invent a Quantum Shrink Ray. It stores the person's size in a pocket of another reality. What happens to the first person under the beam?

Characters:
Hailey-27, beautiful, auburn hair, petite, 5'5". One of the scientists.
Bob-27, dirty-blonde hair, medium build, good looking, 5'9". He's the other scientist.

Both are fairly athletic and, of course, pretty smart.

Add other characters as you like. Other people can shrink as well. Characters can change size throughout, just keep the continuity when they do. No: guy/guy erotic content, keep the foot fetish to a minimum, and obviously no naughty stuff with characters under 18. Also, try to keep the storylines at least 6 chapters long before killing someone off. Otherwise, go wild.
